Actions.Name: Collapse Tunnel
Actions.Description: The Mole creates a line 4 area effect of difficult terrain. Characters standing in the area when it is created must save or be slowed. If a pit is caught in the space, it explodes with a blast 1 area effect, dealing [D]+[fray] to characters within but destroying the pit.

Actions.Name: Dig Down
Actions.Description: Remove the Mole from the battlefield. Return them to any unoccupied space on the battlefield at the start of their next turn.
